body:
Hello everyone. I just started using ladybug and as soon as I try to load any epw file into GenCumulativeSky I keep getting the error



"1. Solution exception:No se pudo encontrar el archivo 'C:\Users\JoseÁngel\AppData\Roaming\Ladybug\SANTIAGO_CHL\SANTIAGO_CHL_dif_1.mtx'."



which means something like



"1. Solution exception:File could not be found 'C:\Users\JoseÁngel\AppData\Roaming\Ladybug\SANTIAGO_CHL\SANTIAGO_CHL_dif_1.mtx'."



I had trouble installing GhPython but I think I solved it following what I found through the discussions but I couldn't manage to find anything working for me.



Attached an image showing the issue.



Thanks in advance.

attachments.name: 1. Solution exception File could not be found..png

topic: 1. Solution exception: File could not be found'C:\Users\JoseÁngel\AppData\Roaming\Ladybug\SANTIAGO_CHL\SANTIAGO_CHL_dif_1.mtx'.
